question: Dua for waking up late
answer:
QUESTION
Assalm-wa-alikum mufti sahab. I tend to be a heavy sleeper, especally when i fall asleep late. So i am usally late for alot of things, espeaclly fajr salat, and i've bought severly alarm clocks, but none of them do the job. So i was wondering if there is a dua i can use to help me wake up at a desired time. I while back i thought i heard of a dua similar to this. Do you know of any dua like this?
ANSWER


Share:
For a person to wake up early in order to make his/her Fajr Salaat, that
person needs to get to bed early and most importantly to read the Masnoon Du
'aas that our beloved Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) should read, i.e.
the three Quls, Aayaatul Kursi, the last two Aayaats of Surah Baqarah, and
then make intention to get up for Fajr. Also, you need to keep the alarm
clock away from you so when it rings you must get out of bed to put if off.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
